channel.title: Petunia inflata on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Petunia inflata on funPlantGenes

item.title: PhACO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PhACO1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Petunia inflata Functional Description: this study increases the understanding of the role of PhACO1 in petunia flower longevity and also points to the CRISPR/Cas9 system being a powerful tool in the improvement of floricultural quality.

item.title: PhZFP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PhZFP1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Petunia inflata Functional Description: Literature: The C2H2-type zinc finger protein PhZFP1 regulates cold stress tolerance by modulating galactinol synthesis in Petunia hybrida.
